title: To know font name and size ?
content:
Hi guys,

I would like to know what is the font name and size used in the above image .let me know which font used in the word " Lincoln ".

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lincoln.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804123440/http:/typophile.com/files/lincoln.jpg) | 29.77 KB |
author: suresh2207

comments.content: Can't be 100% positive but looks like [Blanch](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804123440/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=blanch).
